Package com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController

Class UserSessionController

java.lang.Object
com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController.UserSessionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/session") public class UserSessionController extends Object
The UserSessionController class handles user session-related API endpoints.

    • getAllUsers

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserSession>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all user sessions.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of user sessions or a NOT_FOUND status if the list is empty

    • getSessionById

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/find/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserSession> getSessionById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a user session by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user session to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the user session or a NOT_FOUND status if the user session is not found

    • getSessionByToken

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/find/token/{token}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserSession> getSessionByToken(@PathVariable("token") String token)
      Retrieves a user session by its token.
      Parameters:
      token - the token of the user session to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the user session or a NOT_FOUND status if the user session is not found

    • addUserSession

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/add/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserSession> addUserSession(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Adds a new user session.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user associated with the session
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added user session or a NOT_ACCEPTABLE status if the operation fails

    • updateUserSession

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserSession> updateUserSession(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Updates an existing user session.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user session to be updated
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated user session or a NOT_ACCEPTABLE status if the operation fails

    • deleteUserSession

      @CrossOrigin @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUserSession(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a user session by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user session to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the deletion operation
